main event: On March 31, 1961, a witness observed a round, bright blue object hovering and making erratic maneuvers.
interesting points: The object glowed in blue color and was about the size of a basketball.,The object was at an altitude of approximately 500 feet.,The witness observed the object for approximately 5-10 minutes.,The report documents the object's erratic and rapid maneuvers but does not specify its speed or distance.,There were multiple pages and references in the report, but none contained photographs.
witness description: the witness observed the object clearly during the sighting
